subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ and Mets’ positions in the complex and crowded wild-card standings were identical going into Wednesday, with one team stumbling out the door as the other tried to barge its way in.
snippet: The Yankees’ and Mets’ positions in the complex and crowded wild-card standings were identical going into Wednesday, with one team stumbling out the door as the other tried to barge its way in.
